title: IoT Wardrobe Management System
description: Designed an IoT wardrobe system with FastAPI, MySQL, and ESP32, featuring AI-based clothing recommendations.

title: Gun Detection System
description: Built a gun detection system using YOLOv10 and Flask, achieving 92% accuracy with AWS deployment.

title: Car Accident Injury Predictor
description: Led a team to develop ML models predicting injury likelihood in car accidents using SVM and oversampling.

title: Journal App for Software Developers
description: Built a cross-platform Electron.js journal app with goal tracking, markdown notes, and a calendar.

title: AI Chatbot for Stock Market Data
description: Developed a real-time AI chatbot for stock market insights using Next.js, Tailwind, and Spring Boot.

title: Automated Cloud Security Posture Management
description: Developed an automated CSPM solution using AWS Lambda and Prowler, deployed via CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions and AWS SAM for version-controlled infrastructure. Enhanced continuous monitoring with automated SNS notifications for real-time security alerts.

title: BoardGameReview DevOpsified
description: Architected a CI/CD pipeline for a full-stack review app, reducing build-to-deployment by 95% by containerizing with Docker and orchestrating on a Kubernetes cluster on EC2. Integrated SonarQube and Trivy for automated security scanning, identifying and remediating 72 production environment vulnerabilities.

title: Serverless Feedback Form Application
description: Built a cost-effective serverless feedback application using AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3, with a multi-stage CI/CD pipeline in GitHub Actions. Implemented sentiment analysis with AWS Comprehend and SNS to automatically flag and notify about negative reviews for rapid customer response.
